nodes.text: The Galactic Globetrotters were a shockball team owned by Jaspara, the owner of the Wheel. During one match held while Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker visited the station, the Globetrotters were beating the visiting team, the Ballistic Banthas.
The Galactic Globetrotters share their name with the real-world Harlem Globetrotters, a famous exhibition basketball team.
